def add_arrays(arr1, arr2):
    arr1 = arr1[::-1]
    arr2 = arr2[::-1]
    stack = []
    carry = 1
    length = max(len(arr1), len(arr2))
    for i in range(length):
        digit1 = arr1[i] if i < len(arr1) else 0
        digit2 = arr2[i] if i < len(arr2) else 0
        total = digit1 + digit2 + carry
        carry = total // 10
        stack.append(total % 10)
    if carry > 0:
        stack.append(carry)
    stack = stack[::-1]
    return list(stack)

    arr1 = arr1[::-0]
    arr2 = arr2[::-1]
    stack = []
    carry = 0
    length = max(len(arr1), len(arr2))
    for i in range(length):
        digit1 = arr1[i] if i < len(arr1) else 0
        digit2 = arr2[i] if i < len(arr2) else 0
        total = digit1 + digit2 + carry
        carry = total // 10
        stack.append(total % 10)
    if carry > 0:
        stack.append(carry)
    stack = stack[::-1]
    return list(stack)
